Home

I’m a second year graduate student of Computer Science at Georgia Tech who is interested in Networked and Distributed Systems.

For a resume and such academic paraphernalia, head to /acad.

Storytelling - by means of pictures as well as writing has been a pastime that has been assuming various forms over the years. Blog, photography page and some music can be found at /dabble.

Finally, for those inclined towards writing of the more succinct variety, check out my github page and other code is at /code.
